name: UpdateNewsletterTestTranslation
description:
Update a newsletter's translation for A/B testing.

This tool updates the translation of a specific newsletter variant within an A/B test. It's used when you need to modify the language content for different test groups in newsletter campaigns.

parameters.name: newsletter_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the newsletter. Use this to specify which newsletter to update.

parameters.name: ab_test_group_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the A/B test group to update the newsletter translation for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the A/B test group.

parameters.name: newsletter_language_tag
parameters.description: Specify a language tag for the newsletter translation. Utilize an empty string to default to your system's language. Invalid tags result in an error.

value_schema.description: A [language tag](/journeys/unsubscribe-faqs/#currently-supported-languages) of a language variant. If you don't provide a language (an empty string), we'll use your default language. If the language variant does not exist, we'll return an error.

parameters.name: translation_content
parameters.description: JSON object containing the translation details for the newsletter variant to be updated.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io App API

parameters.name: test_group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the A/B test group.

value_schema.description: The ID of the A/B test group.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: A [language tag](/journeys/unsubscribe-faqs/#currently-supported-languages) of a language variant. If you don't provide a language (an empty string), we'll use your default language. If the language variant does not exist, we'll return an error.

value_schema.description: A [language tag](/journeys/unsubscribe-faqs/#currently-supported-languages) of a language variant. If you don't provide a language (an empty string), we'll use your default language. If the language variant does not exist, we'll return an error.
